page.title: 15Staff College Bracknell
page.content: The College covers 50 hectares and has been built around Ramslade House, the present Officer's Mess,which is about 200 years old.The R.A.F.bought the site in 1939 but many of the buildings date only from the late 60's.There are 240 personnel, consisting of officers,airmen and civilians.Courses are run to prepare students for command and staff appointments.Experienced officers come to the College for Basic and Advanced Courses,which are international. Foreign students from all over the world are there at any one time.The Headquarters for RAF Command and Staff Training is also on the site. Accommodation is provided as well as facilities for shopping,the NAAFI and many sports.Horus,the Egyptian hawk god of learning,is the College emblem.
